name: Akuma no Henshin
description:
Akuma no Henshin is a Super Sentai combat game featuring Ironmouse!
It was made in a week for her birthday!

The evil Monkey man is trying to invade hell... And only you can stop him! Punch your way through his trash army and kick his ass into submission!

How to play
It is recommended to play with a controller!
Punch with X / square / Left mouse button
Kick with Y / triangle / Right mouse button
Dodge with A / cross / Space

Credits
Music: DOVA-SYNDROME
SFX: Universal sound FX
Font: Jayvee Enaguas
Mousey model base: VRoid studio
